name: Pounce (partyvaper)
description:
Game made for Summer Slow Jams July 2021: Remix Games Game Jam.

Pounce = Portal + Bounce

Classic Nokia Bounce game but with added Portals.

Controls:

Move - WASD, Arrow keys

Aim Portal - Mouse

Portals - Left Click, Right Click

Reset position - R (in case you got stuck :D)

Pause - ESC
